name: Sea To Summit X-Seal & Go Large Container
description: Reusable containers are great for the environment, easy to eat from and good at protecting your food from accidental squishing. But once they're empty, these containers take up precious space... unless they're collapsible X-Seal & Go containers. A leakproof seal keeps your lunch from spilling all over your backpack, and the supple silicone lets you get every last drop of sauce. And when you're done, it nearly disappears into your bag.Food-grade silicone doesn’t transfer taste, resists high heat, and is easy to clean.Leakproof seal lets you pack with confidence.Ergonomic grips on the lid and base for easy opening.Collapses down to a mere 1.9cm.Microwave and dishwasher safe.
